subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United was eliminated from the English League Cup by lower-league Coventry, and Chelsea, the defending champion, ended a four-match winless streak with a 4-0 victory. Manchester United, which lost at home for the first time this season, did not play its top team but still had six international players in its starting lineup.
